refnamediv.refpurpose: Read stereo sampled sound from a table with looping and high precision.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: lposcilsa2 reads stereo sampled sound from a table with looping and high precision.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ar1, ar2 lposcilsa2 aamp, kfreqratio, kloop, kend, ift [,iphs]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreqratio -- multiply factor of table frequency (for example: 1 = original frequency, 2 = an octave up). Only integers are allowed

lposcilsa2 is the same as lposcilsa, but no interpolation is implemented and only works with integer kfreqratio values. Much faster than lposcilsa, it is mainly intended to be used with kfreqratio = 1, being in this case a fast substitute of soundin, since the soundfile must be entirely loaded in memory.
